author: adamjgmiller
title: Symbiotic Catalyst Accelerator
description: Catalyst-funded projects need help finding professional business support, institutional capital, and mentoring to accelerate their impact.
solution: Identify and recruit experienced mentors, connect them with Catalyst-funded projects, and support a symbiotic mentor-mentee relationship.
experience: The project team includes entrepreneurs & institutional investors with decades of experience with tech accelerators & mentorship programs.
